acf.title: Head of Business Development, EMEA
acf.bio_copy:
Steve Keller is Head of Business Development, EMEA and responsible for overseeing a team based in London, who source and select new portfolio managers and investment professionals.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2013, Steve served as Head of Americas Financing Sales at UBS from 2012 – 2013. Before joining UBS, he was at Bank of America (Merrill Lynch) from 2006 – 2011, where he held various roles, including Head of Equity Research Sales, Head of Prime Brokerage Sales and Head of Global Market Sales. He began his career at Credit Suisse in 1995 in equity research sales, where he rose to Managing Director.

Steve received a BA from Yale University. He received his MBA from The University of Chicago.
